snippet: The slightest bit of misinformation on Iran’s nuclear project could have an outcome of historic proportions.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Israeli political and military analyst Ronen Bergman cautions the United States and Israel for their use of intelligence cooperation as the basis for deciding whether to attack Iran for its nuclear program; warns that even a slight intelligence gaffe could have an outcome of historic proportions.
lead_paragraph: The slightest bit of misinformation on Iran’s nuclear project could have an outcome of historic proportions.
